notify.title: Big News
notify.content:
My hero, I'm in desperate need of you right now. Only you can save me. You're my only hope.
    My rating is dropping rapidly, and I'm on the verge of disappearing from the digital world.
    Only your 5 - star review can save me.
    If you're satisfied with my service, please head to the Play Store immediately and give me a 5 - star rating.
    A too low score will deprive me of the chance to serve you.
    My hero, please save this world.
